quests.name: Join the Mages Guild
quests.description: Join the Mages Guild and earn recommendations from all guild leaders to gain access to the Arcane University.

quests.name: Anvil Recommendation
quests.description: Investigate a number of deaths along the Gold Road to obtain a recommendation from Anvil.

quests.name: Bravil Recommendation
quests.description: Recover a fellow mage's staff to obtain a recommendation from Bravil.

quests.name: Bruma Recommendation
quests.description: Find a missing mage to obtain a recommendation from Bruma.

quests.name: Cheydinhal Recommendation
quests.description: Recover a lost ring to obtain a recommendation from Cheydinhal.

quests.name: Fingers of the Mountain
quests.description: Sort out a problem with a former guild member to obtain a recommendation from Chorrol.

quests.name: Leyawiin Recommendation
quests.description: Help a mage regain her sanity to obtain a recommendation from Leyawiin.

quests.name: Skingrad Recommendation
quests.description: Find a missing mage to obtain a recommendation from Skingrad.

quests.name: A Mage's Staff
quests.description: Complete your induction into the Mages Guild by creating your own staff.

quests.name: Ulterior Motives
quests.description: Retrieve a book from the Count of Skingrad.

quests.name: Vahtacen's Secret
quests.description: Find out how the Mages Guild's excavation of Vahtacen is faring.

quests.name: Necromancer's Moon
quests.description: Find out about Black Soul Gems.

quests.name: Liberation or Apprehension?
quests.description: Locate a Necromancer informant and return him safely to the Arcane University.

quests.name: Information at a Price
quests.description: Travel to Skingrad to receive information from Count Hassildor... at a price.

quests.name: A Plot Revealed
quests.description: Travel to Bruma and find out why the Mages Guild there has stopped correspondence.

quests.name: The Bloodworm Helm
quests.description: Find the Bloodworm Helm and return it to the Arcane University.

quests.name: The Necromancer's Amulet
quests.description: Find the Necromancer's Amulet and return it to the Arcane University.

quests.name: Ambush
quests.description: Oversee a contingent of Battlemages in their fight against the Necromancers and retrieve a unique Black Soul Gem from an old "friend".

quests.name: Confront the King
quests.description: Find the King of Worms and end the Necromancers' attacks on the Mages Guild.

quests.name: Alchemy Acquisitions
quests.description: Use the expertise of Julienne Fanis for your own benefit.

quests.name: Repairing the Orrery
quests.description: Harness the power of the stars. Rebuild the defiled Orrery and unlock the secrets of this Mages Guild Inner Sanctum.
